titles.title: I Am Trusting Thee Lord Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I Am Trusting Thee, Lord Jesus, Trusting Only Thee! Trusting Thee For Full Salvation, Great And Free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I Am Trusting Thee For Pardon, At Thy Feet I Bow; For Thy Grace And Tender Mercy, Trusting Now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I Am Trusting Thee For Cleansing In The Crimson Flood; Trusting Thee To Make Me Holy, By Thy Blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I Am Trusting Thee To Guide Me, Thou Alone Shalt Lead; Every Day And Hour Supplying All My Need.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I Am Trusting Thee For Power, Thine Can Never Fail; Words Which Thou Thyself Shalt Give Me Must Prevail.

verse.name: v6
